EmailTemplate.subject: See you next Thursday, April 16th at the Pivotal Big Data Roadshow Workshop
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Pivotal Big Data Roadshow Workshop coming up next Thursday, April 16th in New York City, New York. We look forward to seeing you!
Please bring your laptop and power cord to fully participate in this hands-on workshop. A Mac or Linux environment is ideal. For the best workshop experience, please prep your laptop prior to attending following the “Workshop Prerequisites” listed below.
Pivotal Big Data Roadshow Thursday, April 16th, 2015 8:30am - 3:30pm (breakfast & lunch provided) Workshop Agenda <https://pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/nyc>
Pivotal Office 625 Avenue of Americas 2nd Floor New York, NY 10011
Parking Information There are several public parking garages located within a few blocks of Pivotal Office.
WORKSHOP PREREQUISITES All Hands-on Section
- VMware Player. Suggestions: VMware Player (Windows) OR VMware Fusion (MacOS). - RDP Client. Suggestions: coRD (MacOS), rDesktop (linux), Microsoft RDP (Windows)
*Access to VM instance will be provided
QUESTIONS?
Contact Kim Marie Ruquet at kruquet@pivotal.io <mailto:kruquet@pivotal.io> or via cell at (631) 388-0569.
We look forward to seeing you! The Pivotal Team
P.S.- Only a few spots remain! If you have a colleague interested in attending please forward on this link to the workshop details & registration <https://pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/nyc>
